title: What champ to main?
body: With a large variety of different champions viable in the current season. Was wondering who should I main? Previously mained blitzcrank, wukong{{champion:62}}

replies.body:
play all the champ during weekly
and find out who u like, and main that one

I recommend the full healing {{champion:8}} e.g; spell vamp runes, Wind speakers blessing as keystone, dont forget the 8% bonus healing from Runic armour. 
and of course {{item:3065}}, all u need is 45% cd and GG

> [{quoted}](name=LolKaiser,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=44muANzm,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-02T10:15:49.062+0000)
>
> I recommend the full healing {{champion:8}} e.g; spell vamp runes, Wind speakers blessing as keystone, dont forget the 8% bonus healing from Runic armour. 
> and of course {{item:3065}}, all u need is 45% cd and GG

dude.....why would you recommend this? this is cancer, and the exact build of vlad that i use to destroy everyone, shhhhhh
its so strong ahha i love it, gotta run the Nosferatu Vladimir skin, good to see some1 else using this build
I always love Cho'Gath. Can Jungle, top or mid without any concerns. Fun champ to play, and always nice to feast the full tank for 500+ health when building ap <3
Teemo is really good jg atm
Dude, I saw your blitzcrank {{champion:53}} before. It was LCS material. Add me pls :3
Thanks man, Yeah I'm currently in sub list for CLG next season, we'll see if I get selected or not, kappa kappa
